title: Failed to build debug version on Mac OSX
body_html:
I tried to install a debug version of PyTorch with the following command (inside a virtualenv):

DEBUG=ON python setup.py install

And then I just got this:

clang: error: no such file or directory: '/Users/roger/Documents/Workshop/pytorch/torch/lib/libprotobufd.a'
error: command 'clang' failed with exit status 1

ENV:

PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+d958a1d
Is debug build: Yes
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Mac OSX 10.13.6
GCC version: Could not collect
CMake version: version 3.11.3

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] Could not collect

clang version:

Apple LLVM version 9.1.0 (clang-902.0.39.2)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.7.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin

python packages:

Package           Version
----------------- ---------------
appdirs           1.4.3
appnope           0.1.0
astroid           2.0.4
atomicwrites      1.2.1
attrs             18.2.0
backcall          0.1.0
black             18.6b4
cffi              1.11.5
click             6.7
decorator         4.3.0
intel-openmp      2018.0.3

ipython-genutils  0.2.0
isort             4.3.4
jedi              0.12.1
lazy-object-proxy 1.3.1
mccabe            0.6.1
mkl               2018.0.3
mkl-include       2018.0.3
more-itertools    4.3.0
ninja             1.8.2.post2
numpy             1.15.1
parso             0.3.1
pexpect           4.6.0
pickleshare       0.7.4
pip               18.0
pluggy            0.7.1
prompt-toolkit    1.0.15
ptyprocess        0.6.0
py                1.6.0
pybind11          2.2.3
pycparser         2.18
Pygments          2.2.0
pylint            2.1.1
pytest            3.8.0
python-debug      0.1.3
PyYAML            3.13
setuptools        40.2.0
simplegeneric     0.8.1
six               1.11.0
toml              0.9.4
torch             0.5.0a0+cee743f

traitlets         4.3.2
typed-ast         1.1.0
typing            3.6.6
wcwidth           0.1.7
wheel             0.31.1
wrapt             1.10.11

body:
I tried to install a debug version of PyTorch with the following command (inside a virtualenv):

```sh
DEBUG=ON python setup.py install
```

And then I just got this:

```
clang: error: no such file or directory: '/Users/roger/Documents/Workshop/pytorch/torch/lib/libprotobufd.a'
error: command 'clang' failed with exit status 1
```

ENV:

```
PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+d958a1d
Is debug build: Yes
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Mac OSX 10.13.6
GCC version: Could not collect
CMake version: version 3.11.3

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] Could not collect
```


clang version:
```
Apple LLVM version 9.1.0 (clang-902.0.39.2)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.7.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin
```
